H0.text: Centimeters are the metric units that should be used to describe the mass of an object.

H1.text: Liters are the metric units used to describe the mass of an object.

H2.text: Grams are the metric units that should be used to describe the mass of an object.

H3.text: Degrees Celsius are metric units used to describe the mass of an object.

A4.text: The gram is the most widely used unit of measurement for non-liquid ingredients in cooking and grocery shopping worldwide.

A5.text: Many standards and legal requirements for nutrition labels on food products require relative contents to be stated per 100 g of the product
